summary: The first entry into the rebooted customizer series. Comes with every option you can expect from a CC Customizer
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/3093/zPc6p5.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Cynthia and her Elisif replacement looks. You can change the body textures, teeth, face and eyes.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74168/?]Follower Cynthia the Spell Lady and Elisif Replacer[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use  TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE
[/url][/size]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]
[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\[i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\follower_Cynthia[/color][/i][/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\follower_Cynthia[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\follower_Cynthia\body\eyes[/color][/i]. The mouth goes to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actors\character\follower_Cynthia\body\mouth[/color][/i].

Same procedure as above for Elisif. Just put the files in [color=#6aa84f]follower_Cynthia_as_Elisif[/color] instead of [color=#6aa84f]follower_Cynthia[/color]
[/size][color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]

files.name: Follower Cynthia Customizer - CBBE - 1.1.0
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed issue that that the eyes would not change
Added customization options for Cynthia's Elisif replacement
Added PureSkin textures
Removed Captivating Eyes
Optimized the installer
